title: Adding `fi` for Third Place
goal: Use `fi` to mark the third place and practice three-place tagging.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Place tag review:

fa marks → ?
fe marks → ?

(Answers: x1, x2)

Rewrite with tags: mi prami do → ?

(Answer: fa mi cu prami fe do)

New Material (5-7 min)

The Third Place Tag: fi

fi la .alis. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta — I give a book to Alice.

Adding fi lets you mark the third place, enabling complete flexibility with three-place gismu.

fi with dunda

Normal With Tags
mi dunda la cukta la .alis. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta fi la .alis.

Both mean: I give a book to Alice.

Any Order with Tags

Order Sentence Meaning
x1, x2, x3 fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta fi la .bob. I give a book to Bob
x3, x1, x2 fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta I give a book to Bob
x2, x3, x1 fe la cukta fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda I give a book to Bob

All three are equivalent!

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
stidi x1 suggests x2 to audience x3 suggest
smadi x1 guesses x2 is true about x3 guess

Comparing Tags and Conversions

Both achieve similar results:

Goal Conversion Tags
Recipient first la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta
Gift first la cukta se dunda mi la .bob. fe la cukta fa mi cu dunda fi la .bob.

Tags are more explicit; conversions are more concise.

Key Point

fi marks x3. With fa/fe/fi, you can arrange three-place gismu in any order.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Add Full Tags

Rewrite with fa, fe, and fi:

  1. mi dunda la skami la .tam. → ?
  2. la .bob. cu tavla la .alis. la cukta → ?
  3. do benji la notci mi → ?
Answers
  1. fa mi cu dunda fe la skami fi la .tam.
  2. fa la .bob. cu tavla fe la .alis. fi la cukta
  3. fa do cu benji fe la notci fi mi

Exercise 2: Reorder with Tags

Put the recipient (x3) first:

  1. mi dunda la cukta la .alis. → ?
  2. la .bob. cu benji la karce la .tam. → ?
Answers
  1. fi la .alis. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta
  2. fi la .tam. fa la .bob. cu benji fe la karce

Exercise 3: Interpret

Translate to English:

  1. fi la .bob. fa la .alis. cu dunda fe la plise
  2. fe la notci fi do fa mi cu benji
  3. fa do cu stidi fe ti fi mi
Answers
  1. Alice gives an apple to Bob.
  2. I send a message to you.
  3. You suggest this to me.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I give a book to Alice." (normal) → mi dunda la cukta la .alis.
  2. "I give a book to Alice." (tagged) → fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta fi la .alis.
  3. "Alice receives a book from me." (Alice first, tagged) → fi la .alis. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
stidi x1 suggests x2 to x3 suggest
smadi x1 guesses x2 about x3 guess

Place tags so far:

Tag Marks
fa x1
fe x2
fi x3

Summary

You learned fi, which marks x3. With fa/fe/fi, you can express three-place relationships in any word order.

Tomorrow preview: You'll add fo for the fourth place, useful for prices and other x4 arguments.
